display.title: Safari Zone
description: &&3Snares&&r can be used to &&dtemporarily catch mobs&&r.
Snares can also be used to move &&dmove normally immobile blocks&&r like &&3Chests&&r and &&3Signs&&r.
Snared mobs can be used to craft various &&3Abominations&&r - living &&dmechanism components&&r.
In order of least to most unsettling
- &&3Aware Hoppers&&r can craft recipes you &&dcraft in front of them&&r.
